column1: This is a list of tallest freestanding structures in the world past and present. To be freestanding a structure must not be supported by guy wires
column2: the sea or other types of support. It therefore does not include guyed masts
column3: partially guyed towers and drilling platforms but does include towers

column1: == Freestanding structures (past or present) over 350 metres (1
Structures no longer standing are in italics.
For all structures the pinnacle height is given
column2: so the height of skyscrapers may be different from the values at List of tallest buildings in the world.

column1: Structures under construction are included in main list if its current height is over 350 metres (1
